author: dcspark
title: Cardano Omnibus - UTXO Management
description: UTXO Management is handled sub-optimally by wallets, dApps & exchanges causing downtime, higher fees and degrades the user experience
solution: Write input selection algorithms inside the Rust SDK for Cardano so that all projects implementing Cardano have access to state-of-the-art
experience: We have years of experience writing wallets for Cardano and also created the Rust SDK for Cardano which contains a few algorithms we wrote
